gitbook-plugin-codesandbox
==========================

Usage
-----

1. installation

```bash
yarn add gitbook-plugin-codesandbox --dev
```

2. gitbook config

```json
{
  "plugins": ["codesandbox"]
}
```

3. Just write your codesandbox like below

```markdown
{% codesandbox %}
https://codesandbox.io/embed/5k7kk5n73k?hidenavigation=1&view=preview
{% endcodesandbox %}
```

4. Have Fun.
